sense.def:
To learn something
pomeni pridobiti znanje ali spretnost z učenjem ali vajo.

seg.quote: Children learn foreign languages very easily.
The best way to learn is by practical experience.
He had never learnt to read and write.
She is a very slow learner.

sense.def:
To learn a poem, song, or the script of a play
pomeni učiti se ali ponavljati besedilo pesmi ali scenarija neke igre, da si ga zapomnimo.

seg.quote: We have to learn the whole poem.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
learn to behave in a particular way
, se njihovo vedenje postopoma spreminja in se začnejo vesti na določen način.

seg.quote: If only these people could learn to live together.

sense.def:
To learn of something
pomeni zvedeti nekaj o nečem.

seg.quote: They offered help as soon as they learnt of the accident.
She was extremely upset to learn that he had died.
...the night when he learned the truth about Sam.
